meanings.definition: A covering for the head made of hair.
meanings.sent1: She wore a haircap to keep her hair in place.
meanings.sent2: The haircap was soft and comfortable to wear.
meanings.sent3: The haircap looked like a fluffy cloud on her head.
meanings.sent4: Her haircap was a crown of golden strands.
meanings.sent5: The haircap shimmered in the sunlight, attracting attention.

meanings.sent1: She gently haircaps her head before going to bed.
meanings.sent2: He haircaps his hair to protect it from dust.
meanings.sent3: The magician haircaps the rabbit before the trick.
meanings.sent4: The chef haircaps the dish with a sprinkle of herbs.
meanings.sent5: The gardener carefully haircaps the delicate flowers from frost.

meanings.definition: The act of wearing a haircap.
meanings.sent1: Her haircap was a fashion statement at the party.
meanings.sent2: The haircap protected her hair from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The haircap made her feel like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: The haircap symbolized her dedication to her craft.
meanings.sent5: The haircap became her signature accessory.
